Brian Naja

How taxpayers subsidize Walmart

02 February 2013

Walmart is the largest private employer in the U.S. and has the most workers on public assistance.

In 2007, the company shifted from regular shifts to flexible shifts, a change labor activists said was designed to force full-time workers to downgrade their status to part-time, so they would not qualify...
